results.title: Tunnels for the environment
results.brief_description: “Summary: features twin head greenside-mcalpine rock tunnellers at work. the film highlights two major projects: the severn wye cable tunnel to carry national super-grid electricity cables, and at st maximin in france, tunnels for the french water supply network”
results.description: “Summary: features twin head greenside-mcalpine rock tunnellers at work. the film highlights two major projects: the severn wye cable tunnel to carry national super-grid electricity cables, and at st maximin in france, tunnels for the french water supply network”

results.title: Tunnel erosion
results.creator_credit: Rod Power, Soil Conservation Authority of Victoria and State Film Centre of Victoria
results.brief_description: Produced to show the distribution, causes, effects and treatment of a form of land surface destruction which, though relatively rare in other parts of the world, is common in Victoria. Animated diagrams explain how such tunnel erosion is the result of movement of water in the subsoil. The latter part of the film gives a detailed account of reclamation methods used on a demonstration area near the Hume Highway at Avenal.

results.title: Tuning Your Car Engine
results.brief_description: Tuning your car illustrates the correct step by step procedure for tuning a conventional ignition and fuel equipped engine. The program covers : checking parts for serviceability, equipment needed, compression testing, fixing and setting new points, ignition timing, fuel pump pressure testing, air fuel mixture settings, checking battery and charging systems, and inspecting the cooling system.

results.title: Tunarama
results.creator_credit: Geoffrey Shepherd and South Australian Government Tourist Bureau
results.brief_description: Features Port Lincoln, home of Australia’s largest tuna fleet. Shows a procession of floats; a beauty parade; blessing of the boats; “Tunarama” which celebrates the opening of the tuna season; the wild and natural scenery of the Eyre Peninsula; motels; the Port at play and at work; large granaries; tuna canning factory and loading of the merchant ships. Narrated by Eldon Crouch.

results.title: Tumbling and floor exercises
results.creator_credit: Jan Sadlo and Associated Film Services
results.brief_description: Demonstrates proper techniques in various tumbling and floor exercise skills. The moves are then shown together as a series of movements to emphasise proper composition of routines. From basic to intermediate difficulty.

results.title: Tullamarine Project [B/W]
results.brief_description: A crowd waves goodbye to a TAA flight at Essendon Airport, aerial shots of the City of Melbourne and Yarra River. Late developmental stages of construction on the Tullamarine Airport and Freeway. Shot in October 1968.

results.title: Tuktu and his Eskimo dogs
results.brief_description: Illustrates how dogs are used by the Eskimos in both winter and summer as pack animals and for hunting purposes.

results.title: Tugboats and harbors
results.brief_description: Follows a tugboat skipper, crew and harbor pilot through their daily work of moving ships in and out of harbor. Dramatises the enormous effort needed to get goods from one place to another, and illustrates the need for co-operation among many people to accomplish a large task.
